name: MySQL5

getPSDEDataQueryCodeConds.customCond:
EXISTS(SELECT * FROM `DISCUSS_REPLY` t21 
 WHERE 
 t1.`ID` = t21.`POST_ID`  AND  ( t21.`CREATE_MAN` = #{ctx.sessioncontext.srfpersonid} ) )
getPSDEDataQueryCodeConds.name: 查询条件

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: (SELECT COUNT( reply.ID ) AS reply_count FROM DISCUSS_REPLY reply LEFT JOIN discuss_post dis ON dis.ID = reply.POST_ID WHERE dis.ID = t1.`ID`)
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: REPLIES

queryCode:
SELECT
t1.`CREATE_MAN`,
t1.`CREATE_TIME`,
t1.`HEAT`,
t1.`ID`,
t1.`IS_DELETED`,
t1.`NAME`,
(SELECT COUNT( reply.ID ) AS reply_count FROM DISCUSS_REPLY reply LEFT JOIN discuss_post dis ON dis.ID = reply.POST_ID WHERE dis.ID = t1.`ID`) AS `REPLIES`,
t1.`STATUS`,
t1.`TOPIC_ID`,
t11.`NAME` AS `TOPIC_NAME`,
t1.`UPDATE_MAN`,
t1.`UPDATE_TIME`
FROM `DISCUSS_POST` t1 
LEFT JOIN `DISCUSS_TOPIC` t11 ON t1.`TOPIC_ID` = t11.`ID`
